articles.author: Johanna Alonso
articles.title: Wiley to shutter 19 journals - Inside Higher Ed
articles.description: Wiley, an academic publisher, has announced that it is closing 19 journals amid a massive influx of fake papers, The Wall Street Journal reported Tuesday. The publisher has retracted more than 11,300 “compromised” studies over the past two years.
